job_description:

In this role, you will be responsible for generating leads, building strong client relationships, and driving revenue through the sale of IT services and digital solutions. KOTT Software, a globally recognized, ISO 9001:2015-certified company established in 1997, specializes in enterprise product development and offshore software services. We partner with global organizations, including Fortune 100 clients, to accelerate their digital transformation journeys through deep domain expertise and robust enterprise application capabilities.

Join our agile development environment to work on niche US-based domains and industry verticals. You will be involved in technical reviews, quality assurance, and collaborative delivery.

Job Summary: This role requires at least 1+ years of software testing experience in a web application development environment. The position involves interaction with the software application development team, clients, and participation in test design, test case development, test plan creation, and execution of Enterprise Solutions.

Job Responsibilities: - Perform manual testing and related activities for web-based applications. - Collaborate within an Agile development team to meet release schedules and manage patches. - Develop and implement comprehensive test plans, test strategies, test cases, and test reports for various testing types, including regression, functional, and performance testing. - Record and track defects using a web-based project management tool. - Establish and adhere to procedures for managing bugs, issues, and defects. - Conduct testing for all assigned software products/projects. - Potentially work flexible hours to attend client meetings in US/Europe time zones.

Technical / Functional Requirements (Must Have): - Prior experience in testing web-based applications and enterprise-level solutions. - Proven experience in manual testing, including writing test cases. - Solid understanding of the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), software testing methodologies, and procedures. - Ability to identify test scenarios, create test plans, define test strategies, develop test cases, and execute them. - Strong understanding and experience in developing/executing test cases within an application development environment. - Basic knowledge of Quality Assurance/testing life cycle processes. - Minimum of 1+ years of experience in developing AND executing test cases in a client-driven environment. - Experience using any bug-tracking tool.

Preferred Skills: - In-depth knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures. - Hands-on experience with automation tools like Selenium, JMeter, or UFT in a live environment is a plus. - Ability to write scripts in Java or VB Script is advantageous. - Basic SQL concepts and query writing skills. - Good communication and interpersonal skills. - Ability to think creatively and 'OUT OF THE BOX'.

Qualification: - B.E./B.Tech./M.C.A./BCA/BSc. with a Diploma in software testing or quality assurance.

To Apply: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, please share your updated resume with us at manualtest@kottsoftware.com.

job_description:

What we're looking for

We are seeking a passionate Accessibility Developer with strong front-end development expertise to join our Accessibility Team. This role is highly hands-on and development-focused, involving direct contributions to building and optimizing accessible digital experiences. The ideal candidate is a skilled front-end engineer with a deep commitment to accessibility, who can seamlessly blend accessibility best practices with modern UI development. As an integral part of the team, you should also champion the Shift Left movement of accessibility. If that sounds like you, we’d love to hear your story.

Responsibilities

  • Develop pages compliant with WCAG 2.2 AA or other applicable global accessibility standards from scratch wherever applicable.
  • Integrate developed pages with any CMS, any JS frameworks, or any backend web technologies adhering to relevant accessibility guidelines.
  • Implement necessary remediation steps wherever applicable to existing applications or applications we maintain.
  • Stay at the forefront of advancements in various web technologies, accessibility standards, and assistive technology to ensure our solutions and implementations are ahead of the curve and best in class.
  • Collaborate closely with QAs, Designers, and Project and Delivery managers to integrate accessibility testing into the software development lifecycle (SDLC).
  • Provide expert code-level guidance and build performant, accessible, and elegant solutions in collaboration with client teams wherever applicable and effectively communicate solutions for any identified issues.
  • Perform code reviews wherever applicable.
  • Mentor Junior developers wherever applicable.
  • Serve as a leading internal and external voice on accessibility standards, interpretation, and best practices.

Qualifications

  • Must be a certified Web Accessibility Specialist (WAS) or hold similar certifications.
  • Minimum 5 years of professional experience developing accessible applications.
  • Proficient in HTML / CSS / ARIA / JavaScript and RWD.
  • Expertise in implementation of WAI-ARIA.
  • Profound understanding of WCAG 2.0 / 2.1 / 2.2 A / AA / AAA, Section 508, ADA, and EN 301 549.
  • Deep understanding of DOM and browser rendering process.
  • Proficient in utilising assistive technologies like screen readers, screen magnification software, Keyboard and other input mechanisms, and speech recognition tools for development and testing.

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Published: 24, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 31, Oct 2025

Brief Description

We are looking for candidates with 13+ years of experience for this role.

Responsibilities:

  • Own the end-to-end delivery of data platform, AI, BI, and analytics projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and stakeholder expectations.
  • Develop and maintain comprehensive project plans, roadmaps, and timelines for data ingestion, transformation, governance, AI/ML models, and analytics deliverables.
  • Lead cross-functional teams including data engineers, data scientists, BI analysts, architects, and business stakeholders to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions on time and within budget.
  • Define, prioritize, and manage product and project backlogs covering data pipelines, data quality, governance, AI services, and BI dashboards or reporting tools.
  • Collaborate closely with business units to capture and translate requirements into actionable user stories and acceptance criteria for data and analytics solutions.
  • Oversee BI and analytics areas including dashboard development, embedded analytics, self-service BI enablement, and ad hoc reporting capabilities.
  • Ensure data quality, lineage, security, and compliance requirements are integrated throughout the project lifecycle, in collaboration with governance and security teams.
  • Coordinate UAT, performance testing, and user training to ensure adoption and successful rollout of data and analytics products.
  • Act as the primary point of contact for all project stakeholders, providing regular status updates, managing risks and issues, and escalating as necessary.
  • Facilitate agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, backlog grooming, demos, and retrospectives, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.
  • Drive post-deployment monitoring and optimization of data and BI solutions to meet evolving business needs and performance standards.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills:

  • Overall 13+ Years of Experience in IT with 6+ years of experience as a Technical Product Manager, Technical Program Manager, or Delivery Lead.
  • Hands-on development experience in data engineering, including data pipelines, ETL processes, and data integration workflows.
  • Proven track record managing data engineering, analytics, or AI/ML projects end to end.
  • Solid understanding of modern data architecture: data lakes, warehouses, pipelines, ETL/ELT, governance, and AI tooling.
  • Hands-on familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, GCP) and DataOps/MLOps practices.
  • Strong knowledge of Agile methodologies, sprint planning, and backlog grooming.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, including working with senior execs and technical leads.

Secondary Skills:

  • Background in computer science, engineering, data science, or analytics.
  • Experience or Solid Understanding with data engineering tools and services in AWS, Azure & GCP.
  • Exposure or Solid Understanding of BI, Analytics, LLMs, RAG, prompt engineering, or agent-based AI systems.
  • Experience leading cross-functional teams in matrixed environments.
  • Certifications: PMP, CSM, SAFe, or equivalent are a plus.

Important Notice:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

FRAUD ALERT: This is to notify jobseekers that some fraudsters are promising jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Please note that no payment is ever sought for jobs in Reflections. We contact our candidates only through our official website or LinkedIn and all employment related mails are sent through the official HR email id. Please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com for any clarification/alerts on this subject.
summary: Seeking an experienced Project Manager for Data Engineering projects. Must have 13+ years of IT experience with strong skills in data pipelines, AI, BI, and Agile methodologies.

job_description:
Technical Project Manager (Application Development)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Closing Date: 31st October 2025 Job Published: 24th October 2025

Brief Description

Reflections Info Systems is seeking a highly experienced Technical Project Manager (Tech PM) with over 13 years of experience to lead the comprehensive execution of custom application development and integration projects. This role focuses on solutions primarily built on .NET stacks, incorporating modern client frameworks and integration platforms. The ideal candidate possesses a robust technical background coupled with proven project delivery expertise, enabling them to steer complex, cross-functional initiatives from conception through to production rollout. This position demands hands-on involvement across the entire software/product development lifecycle, encompassing planning, estimation, design, development, testing, and release management, while actively collaborating with engineering, product, and client stakeholders.

Job Description

  • Manage the end-to-end delivery of custom software development and integration projects, utilizing technologies such as Java, .NET, and associated tools.
  • Develop and maintain detailed project plans, establish clear timelines, identify critical dependencies, and meticulously track project progress.
  • Coordinate effectively with diverse cross-functional teams, including developers, QA engineers, UI/UX designers, and DevOps specialists, to ensure seamless project execution.
  • Oversee all phases of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC): requirements finalization, development, integration, comprehensive testing (unit, system, UAT, NFR), and deployment.
  • Collaborate closely with architects and technical leads to ensure strict adherence to the defined technical direction and design principles.
  • Proactively identify and effectively manage project risks, scope changes, and necessary schedule adjustments.
  • Act as the primary liaison for clients and stakeholders, delivering consistent and transparent updates, and promptly resolving any arising issues.
  • Ensure the delivery of high-quality products within agreed-upon timelines through efficient team coordination and crystal-clear communication.

Preferred Skills

Technical & Delivery Expertise - Minimum of 13 years of overall IT experience, with 4–6 years specifically in Technical Project Management. - Profound understanding of custom application development, particularly on Java/.NET technology stacks. - Proven experience managing: - Backend and API development. - Integrations utilizing tools such as Apache Camel, IBM Integration Stack. - Database interactions with Oracle and SQL Server. - Client-side development using modern frameworks like React/Angular. - Deployments on leading cloud platforms including AWS and Azure. - Familiarity with Microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps best practices.

Project Management - Expertise in schedule planning, effort estimation, dependency tracking, and delivery monitoring. - Hands-on experience in managing scope and schedule changes, effective stakeholder communication, and issue escalation processes. - Proficiency with project management tools such as Jira, Confluence, MS Project, Git, Jenkins, or equivalent.

Secondary Skills - Experience managing globally distributed teams. - Strong understanding of enterprise-level integrations and complex technology ecosystems.

Soft Skills - Exceptional communication and stakeholder engagement capabilities. - Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational aptitude. - Ability to clearly articulate technical concepts to diverse audiences, both technical and non-technical.

Important Notice Regarding Recruitment

Interested candidates are invited to submit their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current, and expected CTC details.

Please be aware: Some individuals may attempt to solicit payment by falsely claiming to offer jobs at Reflections Info Systems. We never request payment for job opportunities. All official communication from Reflections Info Systems will originate from our official website or LinkedIn profile, and all employment-related emails will be sent from our official HR email address. For any clarifications or to report suspicious activity, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking a Technical Project Manager with 13+ years experience to lead custom application development and integration projects. Role requires strong technical and delivery expertise across the full SDLC.

job_description:
Technical Architect - AI/ML

About Techversant:

Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company with over 16 years of experience, providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruptions.

Our expertise spans multiple technology domains including: ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, iOS, Android, Flutter, ReactNative, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, and Business Intelligence.

What’s important to us:

We are seeking a visionary and hands-on AI Solution Architect who excels at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This client-facing leadership role requires conceptualizing, designing, and delivering robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of emerging AI trends and technologies.

You will own the entire lifecycle of AI solution development, from initial client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement & Consulting
    • Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.
    • Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies clearly.
    • Present solution architectures, effort estimates, timelines, and potential ROI.
  • Solution Design & Architecture
    • Define end-to-end AI architecture including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.
    • Make informed choices of AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure the architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.
  • Hands-On Development
    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts when needed.
    • Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations.
    • Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.
  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight
    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.
    • Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout the SDLC.

Preferred Skills:

  • AI/ML/DL Expertise:
    • Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
    • Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs).
    • Hands-on experience with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.
  • Architecture & System Design:
    • Strong grasp of designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture.
    • Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
  • Cloud & Platforms:
    • Proficiency in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio).
    • Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).
  • Data Engineering:
    • Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning.
    • Tools: Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
  • Product & Project Ownership:
    • Ability to estimate efforts, manage scope, and align delivery with client expectations.
    • Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.
  • Soft Skills:
    • Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills.
    • Ability to simplify complex AI concepts for non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred/Nice-to-Have:

  • Experience with Generative AI (LLMs, GPT, BERT, Stable Diffusion, LangChain, RAG, etc.).
  • Knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Fine-Tuning, and RLHF.

  • Strong reporting and analytical skills using LMS data to support business insights.
  • Ability to troubleshoot system/content issues and manage automated jobs or feeds.
  • Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.

summary: Seeking a Business Analyst for SuccessFactors LMS with 4+ years of experience. Responsibilities include end-to-end LMS administration, troubleshooting, integrations, and reporting for global teams.

Closing Date: 15, Nov 2025 Job Published: 23, Oct 2025

ROLE SUMMARY

  • The Chief Manager - Cyber Security Risk is responsible for the implementation and governance of Cyber Security, Risk, and Compliance frameworks.
  • This role leads the implementation of information security policies, standards, procedures, and best practices to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of information assets.
  • The role coordinates and conducts internal and external risk assessments to evaluate the effectiveness of information/cyber security controls and to suggest/supervise the closure of identified gaps.
  • The role collaborates closely with other business units, CISO, CIO, IT teams, and external stakeholders to ensure alignment of information/cyber security objectives.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Role and Responsibility:
  • Leading the establishment, implementation, and maintenance of an IT/Cyber Security, Risk, and Compliance framework that adheres to regulatory requirements and safeguards MFL's information and technology assets.
  • Managing the development and promotion of Cyber Security, Risk, and Compliance policies, procedures, standards, guidelines, and reporting requirements to protect information and technology assets.
  • Leading the Cyber Security Risk function to ensure that resources (people, technology, and processes) meet operational standards, cost-efficiency, best practices, and performance expectations.
  • Managing Red Teaming, Vulnerability Assessment (VA), Penetration Testing (PT), and other risk assessments as required by business needs.

KEY SKILLS & BEHAVIOURAL ATTRIBUTES

  • Expertise in information/Cyber security standards, frameworks, and best practices, such as ISO 27001, NIST, etc.
  • Ability to assess security policies, procedures, and controls across the organization.
  • Experience in conducting risk assessments and compliance reviews, and preparing reports and recommendations.
  • Strong leadership and communication skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate with senior management and stakeholders.
  • Knowledge of emerging security threats, trends, and technologies, and the ability to proactively identify and mitigate risks.
  • Critical thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex situations and provide effective solutions.
  • High ethical standards and integrity, with the ability to handle confidential and sensitive information.

EDUCATION / EXPERIENCE

  • Graduate / Postgraduate in Computer Science, Information Systems/Technology, Cybersecurity, or a related field.
  • Minimum 10 years of experience in information security management, compliance, and risk assessment roles, preferably within a large and complex organization.
  • Certification in relevant security domains, such as CISSP, CISM, CRISC, CEH, Red Teaming, etc.
  • Must possess strong leadership, communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
  • Must demonstrate a high level of integrity, professionalism, and ethical conduct.
summary: Chief Manager - Cyber Security Risk to implement and govern security frameworks. Responsibilities include policy development, risk assessments, and leading the cyber security risk function.

  • Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
  • Good understanding of IT, SaaS, or digital marketing services will be an advantage.
summary: Seeking an energetic Business Development Executive to identify opportunities and build client relationships. Drive revenue growth for digital services and training divisions.

job_description:
HR Manager at Innure Infotech (P) Ltd

Location: Module No-14, 4th Floor, Nila Building, Technopark Campus, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.innure.com Contact Email: HR@scalevel.in Job Published: 23, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 30, Oct 2025

Brief Description

Innure Infotech (P) Ltd is seeking a dynamic and experienced HR Manager to independently manage all HR functions. This role is ideal for a people-oriented, process-driven individual who can foster a strong organizational culture within a rapidly growing tech and training company.

Key Responsibilities

  • Recruitment & Talent Acquisition: Plan and execute end-to-end hiring processes, including sourcing, screening, scheduling, and onboarding.
  • HR Operations: Maintain employee records, manage attendance and leaves, and coordinate with payroll teams.
  • Performance Management: Develop and track Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), conduct appraisals, and support professional development programs.
  • Employee Relations: Serve as the primary point of contact for employees, address grievances, and promote a positive work culture.
  • Policy & Compliance: Draft and implement HR policies, ensuring adherence to labor laws and statutory requirements.
  • Training & Development: Collaborate with department heads to plan and execute training sessions and workshops.
  • Team Coordination: Work closely with management to align HR strategy with business objectives.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in HR, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • Minimum 3+ years of experience in managing end-to-end HR operations.
  • Strong understanding of labor laws, HRMS tools, and payroll coordination.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple responsibilities.
summary: Seeking an experienced HR Manager for Innure Infotech to manage all HR functions. Role requires end-to-end HR operations, recruitment, and fostering a positive culture.
